mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (ADDRESS_NO, ADDRESS, DEL_YN, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_ADDRESS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{address}, 'N', #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME, M.TEL, A.ADDRESS, A.DEL_YN, A.ADDRESS_NO FROM ADDRESS A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT M.NAME , M.TEL , A.ADDRESS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ADDRESS A ON M.MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO AND A.ADDRESS_NO = M.ADDRESS_NO WHERE A.ADDRESS_NO = #{memberNo}
